_Disable_Optimizations_Options.ROTATION: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to vertex rotation caching (ParticleManagerRotationMixin, BillboardParticleMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.CULLING: [Impact: HIGH] Disables mixins related to particle culling (FrustumAccessor, ParticleAccessor, ParticleRendererFrustumMixin, WorldRendererFrustumMixin, ParticleFrustumBlacklistMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.TYPE: [Impact: Low to Medium] Disables mixins related to particle disabling and reduction (ParticleManagerTypeMixin, ParticleManagerCreatorMixin, FireworksSparkParticleMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.DECREASE: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related particle settings reduction (ALL, DECREASED, MINIMAL) (ClientWorldDecreaseMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.LIGHTMAP: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to light map caching (ParticleManagerCachedLightMixin, ParticleBrightnessCacheMixin, ParticleCachePosMixin, ParticleRendererCachedPosMixin, ParticleRendererBrightnessTickMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.POTION: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related to potion particle disabling (LivingEntityMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.MOVE: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to particle movement optimization (ParticleMoveAdjustMixin, ParticleCachePosMixin, ParticleRendererCachedPosMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.VERTEX: [Impact: HIGH] Disables mixins related to particle vertex drawing optimizations (BillboardParticleVertexMixin, BufferBuilderVertexMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.COUNT: [Impact: Variable] Disables mixins related to max particle count setting (ParticleRendererCountMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.ASYNC: [Impact: Medium] Disables asynchronous ticking of particles (ParticleManagerAsyncMixin, ParticleRendererAccessor)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.RENDER_DISTANCE: [Impact: Variable] Disables mixins that control max particle render distance (ParticleManagerRenderDistanceMixin, ParticleAccessor, ParticleRendererRenderDistanceMixin)
